name: data-components
description: Tiny component structure for web applications

scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git merge master && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master
scripts.build-demo: browserify assets/*.js -o assets/bundle.js -u assets/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build: uglifyjs index.js -c -m -o dist/index.min.js --comments --stats && npm run meta
